Text: could someone please tell me which of dick's books are discussed in the doc?

I Documentary focuses around people who knew PKD personally and his peers.  They discuss many of his works (Valis, Man in a high Castle, Ubik, Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep? amongst others) interspaced with readings and footage of the man himself.

Haven't dl'd it yet, but sounds really interesting.

Thx!
